ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from populating one out of the Regime/Prescription/Patient Order fields. **"Patient Name" formula field on this object, relies on this. Other formulas rely on that field also.**
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please link to only a Regime, Prescription or Patient Order. For example, you cannot link to both a Regime and a Prescription. The Prescription links to the Regime by default so this is not necessary.
